FAQ / Custom Cards / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /
WARNING: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

Starscream, Covetous Crony

  1. When I flip him to Alt mode, and I reveal 3 Orange-pip cards, what happens? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Scrap each of them and give one of your Planes or Seekers Bold 1--three separate times.
  2. When I flip him to Alt mode, and I reveal 3 blank-pip cards, what happens? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Add each of them to your hand and no characters get Bold 1 from this ability.
  3. When I flip him to Alt mode, and I reveal 1 blank-pip card and 2 Blue-pip cards, what happens? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Add the blank to your hand, and scrap the other two. Then, give one of your Planes or Seekers Bold 1--two separate times.
  4. When he’s in Bot mode, and a Seeker of mine attacks and flips 2 blank-pip cards, do I trigger the second ability twice or just once? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    You only trigger it once because the condition is “at least one [blank-pip card].” It doesn’t matter if you flip 1 or 60 blank-pips; the ability will only trigger once on each attack.
